CustomField.formula: IF( AV_BuyingPriceAmount__c>= 1000000, TEXT(FLOOR(AV_BuyingPriceAmount__c/ 1000000)) & ".", "") & IF( AV_BuyingPriceAmount__c>= 1000, RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(AV_BuyingPriceAmount__c/ 1000)), 3) & ".", "") & RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(AV_BuyingPriceAmount__c)), 3) & " " & AV_BuyingPriceCCY__c
CustomField.label: Precio compra del inmueble
